text.name: system_description
text.text: The PDP-1 (Programmed Data Processor-1) is the first computer in the PDP series from Digital Equipment Corporation and was first produced in 1959. The PDP-1 is the original hardware for playing the first game in history on a minicomputer, Steve Russell's Spacewar.
